Release of JDemetra+ Graphical User Interface (+ Cruncher) v3.6.0 with some important bug corrections!

More information at https://github.com/jdemetra/jdplus-main/releases/tag/v3.6.0

All installation procedures (GUI, cruncher, plug-ins) are detailed here 

https://jdemetra-new-documentation.netlify.app/#installing-the-software
 
All rjdverse packages are available on GitHub (https://github.com/rjdverse) and on r-universe (https://rjdverse.r-universe.dev/packages)

Installation procedures are detailed in the README files.
